title: The role of pattern-recognition receptors in innate immunity: update on Toll-like receptors

title: Pattern recognition receptors and inflammation
author: Takeuchi, Osamu and Akira, Shizuo
abstract: Infection of cells by microorganisms activates the inflammatory response. The initial sensing of infection is mediated by innate pattern recognition receptors (PRRs). which include Toll-like receptors. RIG-I-like receptors. NOD-like receptors. and C-type lectin receptors. The

title: Inflammation and insulin resistance
author: Shoelson, Steven E and Lee, Jongsoon and Goldfine, Allison B and others

title: NF-$\kappa$B-dependent induction of microRNA miR-146. an inhibitor targeted to signaling proteins of innate immune responses
author: Taganov, Konstantin D and Boldin, Mark P and Chang, Kuang-Jung and Baltimore, David
journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences
